entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:20 PM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
